record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="vendor" and term="Vendor table" and format.name="vendor" and syslanguage="en"
record.file.name: vendor
record.format.name: vendor

brief.brief: Stores all manufacturer and retail vendor information including vendor address, phone numbers and contacts, and business hours. It also holds data on internal and external service providers.
A vendor record for a particular manufacturer must exist before you can add items from this manufacturer to Service Manager inventory or the Request Management catalog.
The vendor table provides contact and services information for a particular vendor.

detail.detail: The Vendor table links to and from the Inventory, Incident Management, Contract Detail, and Contract files. Build a database of vendors to verify vendors and their pertinent data.

There are often three types of vendors, the manufacturing vendor or the manufacturer, the contract vendor (the vendor on the Contract Detail screen), and the maintenance vendor, (the vendor on the Inventory and Configuration screens.) A vendor record can describe any or all of these three types.
